comment._content: Must have been a delight to see that many romantic sculptures in one display room - heroic themes - Late 19th century dramatic and emotionally expressive

comment.author: 29181237@N06
comment._content: This whole series is absolutely charming as were the times it took place in ...

comment.author: 72834273@N00
comment._content: I posted on Tumblr about this photo, along with a comparison photo from May 2011: analienparisienne.tumblr.com/day/2011/06/06 This is such a terrific photo set and the archives on the Museum site are amazing! Thank you so very much for making these images publicly available! It is terrific fun for me to be able to do a "then and now" comparison with the things I see around and about Paris.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi ParisKarin --

Love this! Can't wait to see more of your then-and-now pix!
We're so happy to bring these images back to the light of day -- when I first saw then in the Archives I KNEW they were special. Going digital is such a great tool for sharing.

Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab

comment.author: 72834273@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/brooklyn_museum]  I'm glad you liked it!  You know, I had not thought of doing more, but it's not a bad plan... This one was by chance, but doing some purposely is a fantastic idea! I'll have to see what I can do about that. :)

Thank you again for doing this work!
